name: Cosmic Dice
description:
Roll the Cosmic Dice. These control the creator of cosmic matter, the little blue cloud at the top.

After each roll, the cloud will spawn a block, the size of which will be determined by the number rolled.

The block will appear only when the die stops moving, so time your rolls to try and build a tower. Your goal is to reach the target height for each level before time runs out.

But be careful, the dice can be temperamental. When the cloud turns red, an evil die will appear. In this state, the cloud will consume matter instead of creating it. The higher the rolled number, the more matter it consumes.

Controls:

  • Roll die: Space or click "Roll" button
  • Pause: Esc or click "Pause" button
  • Speed up: =
  • Slow down: -

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
